mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ${DBName}.${TableName}( <#list ColumName as colum> ${colum.getColumnName()}<#if colum_has_next>,</#if> </#list> ) VALUES ( <#list ColumName as colum> <#noparse>#{</#noparse>${colum.getColumnName()}<#noparse>}</#noparse><#if colum_has_next>,</#if> </#list> )
mapper.update: UPDATE ${DBName}.${TableName} SET <#list ColumName as colum><#if colum.getColumnName()!=KeyName> ${colum.getColumnName()} = <#noparse>#{</#noparse>${colum.getColumnName()}<#noparse>}</#noparse><#if colum_has_next>,</#if></#if></#list> WHERE ${KeyName}=<#noparse>#{</#noparse>${KeyName}<#noparse>}</#noparse>
